name: SweatyMcSweaterson
0:
”Alexa, ask Sweaty Man if I'll sweat today”
”Alexa, ask Sweaty Man how today looks”
”Alexa, ask Sweaty Man will I sweat today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sweaty man
des:
For those of the profusely sweaty persuasion, allow Sweat McSweaterson, master of sweaty matters, to check whether you should leave the house today, lets you melt.

Using the relative location API, based on your device location we can inform you as to your day's "sweaty factor". Just "ask sweaty man" and you'll be informed as to whether your day's weather will break the threshold for sweaty weather.
